name: La Saison des Lilas
description:
La Saison des Lilas is an interactive experience for the « Games and Art » workshop.

A one-week project between ENJMIN and EESI students.

Our experience draws upon the book « Entre neige et loup » by Hélène Canac.

It's a story about Lila, a young girl whose father has forbidden her to go outside.

It is a side-scroller through the four seasons!

We worked on the atmospheres of every settings to give each one a specific feel!

And here is the team who worked on it !
